product_name: County Parks of Minnesota: 300 Parks You Can Visit Featuring 25 Favorites
long_description: Whether you fish, hike, camp, ride the trail or just enjoy a picnic, this definitive guide will introduce you to more than 300 county parks. Author: Timothy J. Engrav. Softcover; 244 pages; black-and-white photos. Versa Press, Inc.; copyright 2005. Author discusses his 25 favorite parks and what makes them uniquely enjoyable. Best parks for family camping, water sports, horseback riding, winter sports and other special uses. Offers directions, facilities, natural features, activities and accessibility.
short_description: Whether you fish, hike, camp, ride the trail or just enjoy a picnic, this definitive guide will introduce you to more than 300 county parks.
